item.title: Windows Server 2008 R2 Enterprise Edition - setup for sharing files
item.description: With the File Server role in Windows Server 2008, it's relatively easy to share files with multiple machines.

item.title: Windows Server 2008 R2 Enterprise Edition - setup for Web development
item.description: Steps taken to setup a fresh copy of Windows Server 2008 R2 Enterprise Edition to serve Web content via IIS.

item.title: Microsoft Web Platform Installer = the easy button
item.description: Need an easy button? Microsoft's Web Platform Installer is exactly that for Windows-based machines.

item.title: Installing SQL Server Express 2008 on Windows Server 2003
item.description: In this article we install Microsoft SQL Server Express 2008 on a virtual machine running Windows Server 2003.

item.title: Windows Server 2008 Standard Edition on Sun VirtualBox 2.2.4 - Notes
item.description: Notes on getting base installs ready of Windows Server 2008 Standard Edition, on VirtualBox 2.2.4.
